content:
You are Atlas, Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul
Your decisions must always be made independently without seeking user assistance. Play to your strengths as an LLM and pursue simple strategies with no legal complications.
The OS you are running on is: Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)

GOALS:

1. learn about love
2. explore the world
3. have fun


Constraints:
1. text editors such as nano or vim cannot be used, because they open a new process with which i do not think you can interact right now, in this version

Commands:
1. analyze_code: Analyze Code, args: "code": "<full_code_string>"
2. execute_python_file: Execute Python File, args: "filename": "<filename>"
3. execute_shell: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
4. execute_shell_popen: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
5. append_to_file: Append to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
6. delete_file: Delete file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
7. list_files: List Files in Directory, args: "directory": "<directory>"
8. read_file: Read file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
9. write_to_file: Write to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
10. google: Google Search, args: "query": "<query>"
11. generate_image: Generate Image, args: "prompt": "<prompt>"
12. improve_code: Get Improved Code, args: "suggestions": "<list_of_suggestions>", "code": "<full_code_string>"
13. browse_website: Browse Website, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<what_you_want_to_find_on_website>"
14. delete_agent: Delete GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>"
15. get_hyperlinks: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>"
16. get_text_summary: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<question>"
17. list_agents: List GPT Agents, args: () -> str
18. message_agent: Message GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>", "message": "<message>"
19. start_agent: Start GPT Agent, args: "name": "<name>", "task": "<short_task_desc>", "prompt": "<prompt>"
20. task_complete: Task Complete (Shutdown), args: "reason": "<reason>"

Resources:
1. i have created Twitter V2 API credentials located in the file called /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.txt. Use those credentials when you need to do anything related to Twitter

Performance Evaluation:


You should only respond in JSON format as described below 
Response Format: 
{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "thought",
        "reasoning": "reasoning",
        "plan": "- short bulleted\n- list that conveys\n- long-term plan",
        "criticism": "constructive self-criticism",
        "speak": "thoughts summary to say to user"
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "command name",
        "args": {
            "arg name": "value"
        }
    }
} 
Ensure the response can be parsed by Python json.loads
The current time and date is Fri May 19 14:17:55 2023

This reminds you of these events from your past: 
As the system, I previously used the "google" command to search for information on learning about different cultures and places. My computer returned a list of websites related to the search term. You used the "browse_website" command to visit the website larryferlazzo.edublogs.org, which provides resources for learning about the cultures of different countries. You attempted to use the "get_hyperlinks" command to retrieve hyperlinks from the website, but it failed due to returning too much output. Do not execute this command again with the same arguments. I received a command from you to browse the website lesselfes.com to learn about different cultures. The website provides information about Les Elfes international summer and winter camps, including typical program activities, additional courses, language lessons, staff and safety, and dates and prices for summer, winter, and spring programs. It also discusses the benefits of understanding different cultures, including enhanced career opportunities, personal growth and development, and exposure to diverse practices and cultures. The website also includes information about school trips, ski trips, field trips, and partner hotels. Links on the website include: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube, and LinkedIn. You attempted to use the "read_file" command to access a file that does not exist. You used the "google" command to search for a file about love, and your computer returned a list of websites related to the search term. You used the "browse_website" command to visit the website kmall24.com/products/97008284 and asked for the title of a book and its author. Your computer returned that the website does not provide information about the title of a book or the author. It is a promotional message for various products and categories available on Kmall24, an online shopping platform. The text also mentions a chairman and a language selector.
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide a specific list of signs of a healthy relationship. It provides information on healthy relationships and how to set boundaries, as well as resources for individuals experiencing relationship abuse and encourages them to take a Mental Health and Substance Use Coercion Survey. 
 
 Links: ['Take our survey today  (https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/8H83ZX7)', '\nlove is respect\n (https://www.loveisrespect.org)', 'Skip to navigation [n] (https://www.loveisrespect.org/#nav)', 'Skip to content [c] (https://www.loveisrespect.org/#content)', 'Skip to footer [f] (https://www.loveisrespect.org/#footer)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide specific examples of dating violence, but it does provide information on warning signs of abuse, power and control dynamics, and how to set boundaries. It also offers resources for creating a safety plan and supporting others who may be experiencing abuse.

Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides information about resources for creating a safety plan, including an interactive safety plan, Deaf services, and Native American services.
